verses.verse: Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> has built <S%H1129><s%> her house, <S%H1004><s%> She has hewn <S%H2672><s%> out her seven <S%H7651><s%> pillars; <S%H5982><s%>
She has prepared <S%H2873><s%> her food, <S%H2874><s%> she has mixed <S%H4537><s%> her wine; <S%H3196><s%> She has also <S%H637><s%> set <S%H6186><s%> her table; <S%H7979><s%>
She has sent <S%H7971><s%> out her maidens, <S%H5291><s%> she calls <S%H7121><s%> From the tops <S%H1610><s%> of the heights <S%H4791><s%> of the city: <S%H7176><s%>
"Whoever <S%H4310><s%> is naive, <S%H6612><s%> let him turn <S%H5493><s%> in here! <S%H2008><s%>" To him who <S%H2638><s%> lacks <S%H2638><s%> understanding <S%H3820><s%> she says, <S%H559><s%>
"Come, <S%H1980><s%> eat <S%H9237><s%> of my food, <S%H3899><s%> And drink <S%H8354><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%> I have mixed. <S%H4537><s%>
"Forsake <S%H5800><s%> [your] folly <S%H6612><s%> and live, <S%H2421><s%> And proceed <S%H833><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of understanding. <S%H998><s%>"

He who corrects <S%H3256><s%> a scoffer <S%H9238><s%> gets <S%H3947><s%> dishonor <S%H7036><s%> for himself, And he who reproves <S%H3198><s%> a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> [gets] insults <S%H9249><s%> for himself.
Do not reprove <S%H3198><s%> a scoffer, <S%H9238><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he hate <S%H8130><s%> you, Reprove <S%H3198><s%> a wise <S%H2450><s%> man, <S%H2450><s%> and he will love <S%H157><s%> you.

Give <S%H5414><s%> [instruction] to a wise <S%H2450><s%> man, <S%H2450><s%> and he will be still <S%H5750><s%> wiser, <S%H2449><s%> Teach <S%H3045><s%> a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man, <S%H6662><s%> and he will increase <S%H3254><s%> [his] learning. <S%H3948><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H8462><s%> of wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> And the knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One <S%H6918><s%> is understanding. <S%H998><s%>
For by me your days <S%H3117><s%> will be multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> And years <S%H8141><s%> of life <S%H9132><s%> will be added <S%H3254><s%> to you.
If <S%H518><s%> you are wise, <S%H2449><s%> you are wise <S%H2449><s%> for yourself, And if you scoff, <S%H9238><s%> you alone <S%H905><s%> will bear <S%H5375><s%> it.
The woman <S%H802><s%> of folly <S%H3687><s%> is boisterous, <S%H1993><s%> [She is] naive, <S%H6615><s%> and knows <S%H3045><s%> nothing. <S%H1077><s%> <S%H4100><s%>
And she sits <S%H3427><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of her house, <S%H1004><s%> On a seat <S%H3678><s%> by the high <S%H4791><s%> places <S%H4791><s%> of the city, <S%H7176><s%>
Calling <S%H7121><s%> to those who pass <S%H5674><s%> by, Who are making <S%H3474><s%> their paths <S%H734><s%> straight: <S%H3474><s%>
"Whoever <S%H4310><s%> is naive, <S%H6612><s%> let him turn <S%H5493><s%> in here, <S%H2008><s%>" And to him who <S%H2638><s%> lacks <S%H2638><s%> understanding <S%H3820><s%> she says, <S%H559><s%>
"Stolen <S%H1589><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> is sweet; <S%H4985><s%> And bread <S%H3899><s%> [eaten] in secret <S%H5643><s%> is pleasant. <S%H5276><s%>"
But he does not know <S%H3045><s%> that the dead <S%H7496><s%> are there, <S%H8033><s%> [That] her guests <S%H7121><s%> are in the depths <S%H6011><s%> of Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>
